trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra denne abstrakt basisklasse Definer geometrisk former.

trans-unit.source: Geometry objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.
trans-unit.target: Geometri-objekter kan brukes for beskjæring testing av treff og gjengivelse 2-D grafisk data.

trans-unit.source: ## Geometry Compared to Shape The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape?displayProperty=fullName> class has a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>, and other rendering properties that Geometry and its derived classes lack.
trans-unit.target: ##Sammenlignet med geometri i form av <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape?displayProperty=fullName>klassen har en <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>, og andre gjengivelse egenskaper som geometri og de avledede klassene mangler.</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape> class is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and therefore participates in the layout system; its derived classes can be used as the content of any element that supports <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> children.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape>klassen er en <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>og derfor deltar i systemet oppsettet; de avledede klassene kan brukes som innholdet i elementet som støtter <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>barn.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape>

trans-unit.source: The Geometry class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of a shape, and cannot render itself.
trans-unit.target: Klassen Geometry, på den andre siden ganske enkelt definerer geometri av en form, og kan ikke gjengi seg selv.

trans-unit.source: Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses.
trans-unit.target: Det har en rekke bruker på grunn av enkelt.

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the Geometry class provides several special features: Geometry objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable funksjoner:** fordi den arver fra den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>klasse, Geometry klassen som inneholder flere spesielle funksjoner: Geometry objekter, kan er deklarert som delt mellom flere objekter, skrivebeskyttet å forbedre ytelsen, klone og gjort sikker.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om de ulike funksjonene som er angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter, se [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som angir akse justert avgrensende boksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property does not take into account the area potentially added by a stroke.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen tar ikke hensyn området potensielt lagt til av en strek.

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>, making deep copies of the object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av objektets verdier.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Combines the two geometries using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"></xref> and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.
trans-unit.target: Kombinerer to geometri parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"> </xref> og gjelder den angitte transformeringen resulterende geometri.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.StandardFlatteningTolerance%2A> property) when combining geometries.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker standard toleransen faktorer (beskrevet av det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.StandardFlatteningTolerance%2A>egenskapen) ved å kombinere geometri.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.StandardFlatteningTolerance%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify your own tolerance factor, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi din egen toleransen faktorer, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> methods (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: Noen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>metoder (eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>) produsere eller bruke en mangekantede tilnærming av geometri.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation.
trans-unit.target: Toleransen faktorer angir maksimalt antall avstanden mellom punkter i denne mangekantede tilnærming.

trans-unit.source: Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.
trans-unit.target: Mindre toleransen verdier gi bedre approximations, men krever flere behandling enn tilnærmet med en stor toleransen faktorer.

trans-unit.source: Careful thought should be involved when using Combine to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive.
trans-unit.target: Forsiktig tanke må være involvert ved Kombiner til å utføre en union som det kan være svært CPU-kostbar.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> will work better.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller en <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>fungerer bedre.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: Use Combine only when any of the following apply: - The geometric operation is not a union.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Kombiner bare når en av følgende Bruk:-geometrisk operasjonen er ikke en sammenslåing.

trans-unit.source: - Either of the geometries has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> actually matters).
trans-unit.target: -Enten geometri har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>verdien <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>og av geometri selv kryssende (det vil si at det <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>faktisk viktig).</xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>

trans-unit.source: - Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached).
trans-unit.target: -/ Klokkeslettverdier er et problem, men er plass (for eksempel hvis geometri er opprettet én gang, og deretter bufret).

trans-unit.source: Typically, Combine produces smaller output than <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis gir Kombiner mindre utdata enn <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> does not provide the desired outline.
trans-unit.target: -Resulterende geometri skal streket eller brukes i en bane-animasjon og <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>ikke inneholder den ønskede rammeomrisset.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.target: Andre geometri å kombinere.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the geometries are combined.

trans-unit.source: A transformation to apply to the combined geometry, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En transformasjonen som skal brukes til kombinert geometri eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The combined geometry.
